event.title: found an established portage route from what is now

data.event: Early fur traders found an established portage route from what is now Fort Fitzgerald, on the western bank of the Slave River to Fort Smith.

event.title: had been traditionally used by local aboriginal people for centuries

data.event: The portage trail had been traditionally used by local aboriginal people for centuries.
By 1870, Cree had occupied the Slave River Valley.
